sentences.cn: 决定性的因素 / 胜利 / 战役

sentences.en: A decisive person acts quickly and often succeeds.
sentences.cn: 果断的人行动迅速,常常成功.

sentences.en: He should give way to a younger, more decisive leader.
sentences.cn: 他应该让位于更年轻、更有决断力的领导者。

sentences.en: Human effort is the decisive factor.
I work very efficiently and am decisive, and accurate in my judgement.
sentences.cn: 我工作非常有效率，处事果断，而且判断准确。

sentences.en: Man is a decisive factor in doing everything.
sentences.cn: 人是做每件事情的决定性因素.

sentences.en: The decisive goal arrived against the run of play.
sentences.cn: 这个决定性的得分逆转了场上的局势。

sentences.en: The meeting between Molotov, Bidault and Bevin was decisive.
sentences.cn: 莫洛托夫、皮杜尔和贝文之间的会晤起到了决定性作用。

sentences.en: They are ready to fight a decisive battle.
They offered opposing players bribes to fix a decisive league match against Valenciennes.
sentences.cn: 他们贿赂对方队员，在联赛对阵瓦朗谢讷队的一场决定性比赛中作弊。

sentences.en: They were outplayed by the Colombians' slick passing and decisive finishing.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚队凭借流畅的传球和终场前的制胜进球击败了他们。

sentences.en: This is a time of decisive action and quick thinking.
sentences.cn: 这个时候应该果断行动、快速反应。

sentences.en: This was the decisive moment of a decisive battle!
sentences.cn: 这是决战的最后五分钟了!

sentences.en: Voters perceive him as a decisive and resolute international leader.
sentences.cn: 投票者认为他是一位坚定果断的国际领导人。

sentences.en: What was needed, he said, was decisive action to halt what he called these savage crimes.
sentences.cn: 他说，当务之急就是采取果断行动制止他所称的“这些野蛮罪行”。

sentences.en: Women can play a decisive role in the debate over cloning.
sentences.cn: 对于克隆问题的辩论，女性能起到决定作用。

words.tran_cn: 明确的；显然的；坚决的，果断的
果断地；断然地；明显；毫无疑问

trans.tran_cn: 决定性的，明确的，决断的
trans.tran_en: an action, event etc that is decisive has a big effect on the way that something develops
